_commenton_imperwell: If used, the imperwell fields will overwrite the columns and rows. Set to 0 if not using.
_commenton_SABERdict: If used, keys are folder names of the rounds, and values are channel-to-[stain, frame] mapping
For the stain that is common between rounds, include _roundN in stain name.
e.g. {'round0':{'DAPI':['DNA_round0', 0]}}. Set to {} if not using.
_commentonstitchorder: Typically should be either 'Grid: snake by rows','Grid: row-by-row', or 'Filename defined position'
